text.body: Is fictional character Star Trek media franchise First portrayed by Leonard Nimoy original Star Trek series Spock also appears animated Star Trek series two part episode Star Trek Next Generation eight Star Trek feature films numerous Star Trek books comics video games
In film Star Trek sequel Star Trek Into Darkness Nimoy reprised his role alongside Zachary Quinto who played younger alternate universe version character Jacob Kogan playing Spock as child

Spock serves aboard starship Enterprise as science officer first officer later as commanding officer two iterations vessel Spock s mixed human Vulcan heritage serves as important plot element many character s appearances
Along Captain James T Kirk Dr Leonard Bones McCoy he one three central characters original Star Trek series films

After retiring Starfleet Spock serves as Federation ambassador contributing toward d tente between Federation Klingon Empire his later years he serves as Federation ambassador to Romulan Star Empire becomes involved ill fated attempt to save Romulus supernova

The character initially depicted as USS Enterprise s science officer original pilot The Cage Although The Cage did air Spock s eleven years service under command Captain Christopher Pike referred to depicted The Menagerie other episodes

The character s first broadcast appearance The Man Trap introduces him as ship s science officer first officer under Captain James T Kirk William Shatner Star Trek depicts troika Spock Kirk Doctor Leonard McCoy DeForest Kelley while McCoy often acts as Kirk s conscience

Spock no longer Starfleet having resigned returned home to pursue Vulcan discipline Kolinahr Spock unable to complete Kolinahr ritual after he senses coming V ger rejoins Starfleet to aid Enterprise crew their mission
film s final scene he joins crew newly commissioned USS Enterprise A under Kirk s command Star Trek V Final Frontier Spock Enterprise crew confront renegade Sybok

In film s flashback set years after events Unification as depicted comic miniseries Star Trek Countdown Ambassador Spock Nimoy promises Romulans he use Vulcan technology to save them rogue supernova threatens to destroy their Empire
Stranded alternate past prime version Spock helps alternate younger versions himself Kirk Zachary Quinto Chris Pine respectively thwart Nero s attempt to destroy Federation
In Star Trek Into Darkness Spock Prime described as living on New Vulcan while younger Spock remains aboard Enterprise struggling loss his homeworld as well as his relationships Uhura Captain Kirk

Spock born city Shi Kahr on planet Vulcan His father well known Vulcan ambassador Sarek his mother Amanda Grayson human teacher Serving as outstanding Starfleet officer decades later as ambassador Spock probably most famous Vulcan Human hybrid history

Spock got into argument his father when he chose career Starfleet service instead Vulcan Science Academy Spock graduated Starfleet Academy As young lieutenant he served as science officer on board U S S Enterprise NCC under command Captain Christopher Pike he witness Pike s capture by inhabitants Talos IV
After end five year mission Spock underwent Kolinahr training on Vulcan to achieve total emotional supression He returned to Enterprise when confronted V ger entity
On training mission turned into real mission under Admiral Kirk they went search fate top secret Genesis Device came under fire old nemesis Khan
Kirk crew spring McCoy illegally head to Genesis Planet stolen Enterprise to find regenerated Spock angry Klingons who like to shoot at them
In Spock while still whole joins Enterprise crew their stolen Klingon ship returns to Earth court martial trial only to find Earth under attack by probe looking extinct humpback whales
While Spock Sarek always something strained relationship due to emotion less nature Vulcan society when Spock chose to enlist Starfleet against Sarek s wishes caused major rift between them

Spock certified as Starfleet Computer Specialist soon assigned to U S S Enterprise where he served as Chief Science Officer under Captain Christopher Pike eleven years When Pike promoted to Fleet Captain Spock remained aboard Enterprise as First Officer under ships succeeding Captain James Kirk
